title: VVAAGG Cell Phone Lanyard for iPhone - Crossbody Phone Strap and Wrist Strap Kit, Cellphone Lanyard for Most Smartphones
description: Adjustable Length: The length of the phone lanyard crossbody can be adjusted to suit your preferences and ensure a comfortable fit.
Durable Construction: Made from high-quality materials, this iPhone lanyard is built to withstand daily use and wear.
Universal Compatibility: Compatible with most Android Phone models, this phone lanyard features a secure attachment point to keep your phone safe.
Convenient Design: This phone leashes allows you to securely carry your iPhone hands-free, preventing drops and keeping your device within easy reach.
Easily Charge Your Phone: The universal phone chain does not block your charging hole, so you can easily charge your phone while using the product.

Protect your phone and keep it within reach with this convenient cell phone lanyard for iPhone. Designed specifically for iPhone models, this lanyard features a secure clip or loop that attaches to your phone, allowing you to wear it around your neck or wrist. The adjustable strap ensures a comfortable fit, while the durable materials provide long-lasting use. Whether you're on the go, at work, or running errands, this lanyard keeps your iPhone close at hand, reducing the risk of drops or misplacement. With a range of stylish colors and patterns to choose from, you can find an option that complements your personal style. Stay connected and organized with this practical cell phone lanyard.
